Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a Java class for handling Protocol Buffers (protobuf) communication over TCP sockets, including message sending, receiving, and callback management for different response types (error, warning, info, success).

Class Description: ProtobufIO is a TCP client implementation that facilitates bidirectional protobuf message exchange with a server. It handles message serialization/deserialization, connection management, and provides callback mechanisms for processing server responses.

Attributes:

sock: [Socket] - TCP socket connection to the server
inputStream: [InputStream] - Input stream for reading data from the server
outputStream: [OutputStream] - Output stream for writing data to the server
thread: [Thread] - Worker thread for handling incoming messages
shutdown: [boolean] - Flag indicating whether the connection should be terminated
outStream: [PrintStream] - Output stream for logging/debugging
callbacks: [List<MessageCallback>] - Registered callback handlers for server responses
apiCallIdGen: [AtomicLong] - Generator for unique API call IDs
CALLBACK_LOCK: [Object] - Synchronization object for callback operations

Methods:

ProtobufIO: [Constructor](String host, int port, PrintStream out, String threadName) -> [void] - Initializes TCP connection to specified host:port and starts worker thread
send: [long](String apiCall, MessageLite msg) -> [long] - Sends a protobuf message with auto-generated API call ID
send: [long](long apiCallIdRef, String apiCallRef, MessageLite... messages) -> [long] - Sends one or more protobuf messages with specified API call ID
send: [void](byte[] data) -> [void] - Sends raw byte data with length header
registerCallback: [void](MessageCallback callback) -> [void] - Registers a callback handler for server responses
unregisterCallback: [void](MessageCallback callback) -> [void] - Unregisters a callback handler
getNextApiCallId: [long]() -> [long] - Generates and returns a new unique API call ID
shutdown: [void]() -> [void] - Closes the connection and stops the worker thread
callback: [void](long apiCallId, long retCode, String message, String cause, String correction, String details, Map<String, String> objRefsMap) -> [void] - Internal method to dispatch callbacks based on response type
ProtobufIOWorker.run: [void]() -> [void] - Worker thread implementation for reading and processing incoming messages (inner class)
